creator: tim@businessglue.com
text:
I came across a typo in the current Ant online and shipped documentation.
The "Petternset" definition of Directory Based Tasks section in the manual has
the following typo:

Patternset
We said that Directory-based tasks can sometimes act as an implicit <fileset>,
but in addtion to that, a FileSet acts as an implicit <patternset>.

** addtion (addtion should be addition)

The file is in the ant/docs/manual/dirtasks.html file.
